message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the market value, but I'm still confident that this product is worth more than $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $825000. I think this is a fair compromise that still reflects its unique value.
